title: Dating Trouble
description: Never trust a twin!I want Ethan, and Chris wants me.Somehow, I managed to get caught between identical twin brothers at school this fall. Both of them want to date me, so I only have to take my pick. Right? Wrong! Ethan is reluctant to kiss me, and Chris wants me for the entirely wrong reasons.Nothing like his obliging and sweet brother, Chris Donovan has trouble written all over him. He changes girls like other guys change t-shirts, and the next trophy on his little list is me. I swear that’s never going to happen. So why the heck did I let him feed me with strawberries when we were alone in his house? I knew I was getting myself into more trouble than I could possibly handle when I did what he said and closed my eyes…
author: Anna Katmore
